item.description:
Hello All,

Women in Business Network successfully held the Kick Off event on May 23 at Apgujung Restaurant.  We had a wonderful group of fellow women in business who enjoyed networking in the beautiful atmosphere of Apgujung.  To keep the enthusiasm and energy from the successful Kick Off event, we will have our first networking luncheon meeting on Tuesday, June 14, 12:00pm -2:00pm at Apgujung. 

This is an opportunity to build and develop lasting business connections.

There will be a table available for business cards and promotional materials.

Please note that the $15.00 event fee includes the cost of the buffet lunch, gratuities and cost to maintain the Meetup group. 

Hope to see many of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in a private section.
item.name: Networking Luncheon Scheduled!
